data.message: Happy birthday shady~today october 17 in 1972 (i know 1972 he looks so young and sounds godlike) a legand was born as marshall mathers the third son of debbie and marshall mathers jr and farther of haile jade scott mathers born december 25th 1995. the most awsome man ever known to existance dealing with assholes doubting him (sorry my spellings shit) becuse of his race and being booed off stage becuse of it #fuckrasisum also suffering drug addiction,his ex wife attemping sucide and looseing his best friend proof in 2006 (R.I.P Proof) and his uncle ronnie (R.I.P) and even overdoseing on drugs he pushed though all of the bullshit life through at him and has become one of the best rappers of all time and also the man who litterally helped me keep my will to live and feel ok when other assholes didn't marshall you mean more than the world to me happy 44th sorry i suck at writing things but hopefully you enjoyed this one
